This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0927 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
L Left ArmLeft Arm
R Right ArmRight Arm
B Both ArmsBoth Arms

name: ArmStick
title: armStick
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the arm(s) receiving the stick.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DON segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0927 (Arm Stick)
